Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark III

The Olympus OM-D E-M10 Mark III is a huge step up from the Mark II, bringing 4K video recording, a faster processor, faster continuous shooting, slow motion video and an intuitive, easy to navigate menu layout to a stylish, well-built, and beautifully designed mirrorless camera body.

The E-M10 Mark III inherits 4K video recording at 30p from its bigger, pro brothers, and will shoot Full HD at 60p, all made easier by the Truepic VIII image processor to handle everything, and a 121-point Contrast AF system that locks on to subjects quickly and precisely.

    Key Features

  • 16.1 megapixel sensor
  • Truepic VIII image processing engine
  • ISO range from ISO 200 to 25,600
  • Built-in 5-axis sensor-shift image stabilisation
  • 121-point Contrast AF Sequential shooting at approx. 8.6fps
  • 4K video (3840 x 2160) at up to 30p
  • One-button Super Control Panel
  • Refined grip & larger control dials
  • Intuitive operation

Pre-Order Now
